message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $20,000. I believe it will be highly beneficial to you.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I understand the value of the product, but I am only able to offer $16,000 for it.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your understanding of the product's value.  How about we meet in the middle at $18,000?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Based on my budget constraints, I would like to propose $17,000 for the product.
